item.title: Three things no. 3
item.description: I skipped last week’s three things, because I wrote this post about forgetting as doctrinal development instead. That post actually started out as a three things post, before I realized I should really just make it its own post. On The Lamp’s blog, Peter Hitchens reflects on the apple tree as a symbol for Christ. He is interested in the convergence of Christ crucified on a tree & the apple tree as an explosion of life & fruitfulness.
